main.name: Mike Reams
main.bio: Hi, I am Mike! A fearless, humble, and passionate leader with a burning desire to be an inspirational role model that helps unlock the capacity of the organization to draw out potential in people, and to drive the progressive realization of innovative thinking.

education.description: I was a drop-in for 4 years while studying for my Business Management and Computer Science degree.

work.title: Co-Founder
work.description: We provide a global community platform where creators can collaborate and develop innovative ways to supercharge their brands.

work.title: Director of Enterprise Architecture
work.description: Cleveland, OH - Built and lead a highly skilled team of architects in establishing and directing the architectural vision. Developed an Enterprise Architecture (EA) program

work.title: Lead Enterprise Architect
work.description: Atlanta, GA - Orchestrated the EA program for generating deliverables which guide the direction for managing 50+ enterprise portfolio and business strategies. Core responsibilities included Roadmaps, Designs, Investment Portfolio, Research, Digital Presence, Long-Range Budget Planning, Technology Expertise, Technical Writer, and Black Ops.

work.title: Portal Consultant
work.description: Atlanta, GA - Provided outside consulting for administration to Plumtree G6 Portal.

work.title: Sr. Server Engineer
work.description: Atlanta, GA - Responsible for managing 100 + Physical servers, over 100 + Virtual servers, and SAN/Network appliances in the Datacenter.

work.title: Web Systems Engineer
work.description: Atlanta, GA - Provided administrative support for the Plumtree Portal platform and developed .NET portlets for executive reporting and searching capabilities.

work.title: System and Application Support
work.description: Atlanta, GA - Provided the overall company IT support along with managing the IT budget. Collaborated with the CEO and VPâ€™s on aligning the technology with the business strategy

work.title: Sr. Systems Support Specialist
work.description: Atlanta, GA - I began my career through the internship program at Valdosta State which is what brought me to IBM in Atlanta. Provided end-user support for the learning services division in which I learned many different on the IBM software platforms including Tivoli, AIX, DB2, Lotus Notes, and many more.

skills.name: WEB3 (NextJS, Tailwind, Thirdweb, Moralis, Infura, IPFS, Sanity.io,Cloudinary, Supabase, Firebase, Netlify, Ethereum/Polygon)

testimonials.text: Mike is absolutely fantastic and I would definitely recommend
